Compatible with iOS 9 - 13

A replacement for FLEXible. Trigger the FLEX window by holding the status bar or long pressing anywhere with 3 fingers. If you're on iOS 9 and below and want Activator support, you may

FLEX is a debugging tool for iOS developers. Learn more

Configure options from Settings.

Fix for iOS 13.3 for FLEX to display on the lock screen properly - Fix status bar gesture not working on iOS 13
- Fix possible crash
v1.0.0-2
FLEXing has been split up into two separate packages:

- libFLEX: includes all the FLEX classes, which anyone can now provide
- FLEXing: simply loads libFLEX, and anyone can write a replacement

These tweaks can now be updated independently of one another, and anyone can make their own FLEX loader tweak with different features while using the most up-to-date version of FLEX. FLEXing is now at version 1.0.0, while the version of the libFLEX package reflects the version of FLEX it was built with, starting with 3.1.0.
- Support for arm64e / A12
- Copy object address by long-pressing on description
- Address explorer (paste an address to view object)
- Fixes logging for iOS 10+
- Adds back a gesture to activate window without status bar
- 3 finger hold anywhere


Updated for iOS 12 Forgot to remove artificial Activator requirement from the previous version. This version does not require Activator. Long press on the status bar to open. Also:

- Add "Get" button to property/ivar editor screen
- Fix crash surrounding SwiftObject subclasses
- Fixed instance chooser returning a FLEXObjectRef and not the selected object - Added +[NSBundle mainBundle] to the globals list Long press on status bar to activate, since last update relied on a feature of RocketBootstrap that doesn't actually exist. Sorry for the inconvenience!

Includes other minor bug fixes.
Updated to latest FLEX source:
- Fixes a handful of crashes
- Misc new features and enhancements

Other changes:
- Drops OBJCIPC dependency (you can uninstall it if nothing else depends on it)
iOS 10 compatability

If the Flex window won't appear in certain apps, please reach out to me on Twitter @ThePantsThief or email me at ThePantsThief@me.com. I may have a solution that I want kept quiet.
Fixes a possible crash when viewing properties of an object - New icon
- Updated to latest FLEX version
